name: Championship Clash Boxing
summary:
Step Into the Ring. Write Your Comeback.

1.  Train in VR or Mixed Reality (MR)
  Use your real-world space to practice punches, footwork, and reactions in immersive, adaptive training sessions.
{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}

2. Adaptive Opponents – No Two Fights Alike
Opponents dodge, block, and counter based on your style. You’ll need timing, patience, and precision. Every round is a new challenge.

3. Reflex Rings & More
Mini-games keep stacking...
